sentences.en: A mere verbal statement is of no help.
According to psychologist Martin Lloyd-Elliott, 90 per cent of communication between people is non-verbal.
sentences.cn: 根据心理学家马丁·劳埃德·埃利奥特的研究，人们之间90％的交流是非语言的。
避免使用复杂的动词结构。

sentences.en: I wrote a memorandum to confirm our verbal agreement.
sentences.cn: 我写了份备忘录以确认我们的口头协议.

sentences.en: Interviewers quickly learn to pick up non - verbal signals.
sentences.cn: 采访者很快学会读懂 非 言语信号.

sentences.en: Raft repeatedly hurled verbal abuse at his co-star.
sentences.cn: 拉夫特不断地破口大骂和他联合主演的演员。

sentences.en: The job applicant must have good verbal skills.
sentences.cn: 应聘这份工作的人必须具有良好的语言表达技能。

sentences.en: The test has scores for verbal skills, mathematical skills, and abstract reasoning skills.
sentences.cn: 测试包含对语言能力、数学能力和抽象推理能力的考查。

sentences.en: The verbal skirmish is viewed as the opening round in negotiation schedules to start next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 这场争论被看作预定下星期二举行的谈判的序幕.

sentences.en: They cross verbal swords with each other.
sentences.cn: 他们彼此唇枪舌剑地交锋.

sentences.en: They were jostled and subjected to a torrent of verbal abuse.
sentences.cn: 他们被推来搡去，受到大肆的谩骂攻击。
韦恩的语言表达能力很强。

sentences.en: We have a verbal agreement with her.
sentences.cn: 我们和她有个口头约定。

sentences.en: You don't have to tolerate any verbal or physical abuse.
sentences.cn: 你不是非得忍受任何口头上或身体上的侮辱.
